1.content: Now, time to begin the basic choice options so we can get on with the actual story. So with that said, what gender do you want your victim for today to be?
1.title: The beginning of an animal filled future

11.content: Oh! A future animal girl, I see, classic choice. So now, how old is this soon to he animal girl going to be?
11.title: Animal

113.content: So now that you've got your gender and age down, now its time for the really fun things to start. What type of animal is this girl going to end up a hybrid of?
113.title: Teenaged Animal Girl in the making

1131.content:
The ultimate classic. How will our teenage girl end up as a purfect neko? Choose from one of the options below or go through the "other" chapters to come up with your own catty ways to make this young teen into a pretty kitty

Hypno Kitty
The victim is hypnotized during a performance to behave like a cat. Yet, even after the show ends some of these behaviors seem to stay and even grow worse with time. After some time, the hypnosis even tricks the body into thinking the girl is really a neko, so it quickly tries to correct the "errors"

Science Fair Mishap
The usual science fair, nothing to out of the ordinary, well all expect one very special entry. A device that claims to be able to rewrite the genetic code of any creature in real time. While showing it's effects off on a ginie pig, it's accidentislly shoot at the poor teenager in question. All seems fine at first, no changes happen on the spot. But over time our poor victim starts to feel a lot more catty then usual

Magic Collar
When walking home from school one day, the teen in question comes across a rather cute looking pink cat collar. At first they decide to just keep it, having no idea why. Though soon she hear it calling out to her, telling her to put it on. Eventually she gives in, finding it a catastrophe just waiting to happen

Other
Now its YOUR turn to come up with some unquie scenarios to turn this young teen into a teen neko!
1131.title: Neko Neko

1132.content:
How does this teen go from a normal girl to the newest mutt girl on the block?

Woof Hair Problem
The teen accidentally mixes her shampoo up with her dog's new one. After finding out how smooth it makes her hair feel, she continues using it without realizing the price of such until it's too late. At first, she just has some slightly canine urges, like wanting to chase after squirrels but soon she'll be chowing down on some tasty nibbles as her new tail wags back and forth. Let's just hope she finds a new family willing to take her, wouldn't want such a cute puppy girl to end up as a stray, would we?

Dogsitter to Dogsat
The teen in question takes a job to look after a dog while their owner is away for the next week. Though after getting some strange instructions from the dog's owner, she goes to the house only to find no dog. She decides it must just be elsewhere and goes through the motions of carrying out their instructions. Though as the days roll by and she still doesn't see the dog she grows a bit suspicious, not even noticing the canine changes her body and mind are undergoing throughout the week. Oh well, let's just hope the owners appreciate their new dog girl when they get home, and that she doesn't mind being dogsat when they eventually go on another vacation

Tag, you're a dog
On her way home from school after staying late for cheerleading practice, our teen hero finds a cute looking collar along with a dog tag inscribed with her details. Shrugging she simply takes it home with her, assuming it to be a prank or coincidence. That was a fatal flaw, shown very obviously when she suddenly feels compelled to put the dog collar on during the night. By the end of the week, she might be cheering on her team with a more innocent love than before, and with a new tail and ears to boot!

Other
How else could we make this theoretical teen into a man's most loyal companion? Well, that's up to you to decide!
1132.title: Woof Woof

1133.content:
A cute classic indeed. So how will our teenage protagonist end up as one of the most bouncy and fluffy creatures nature has to offer?

Radioactive Bunny
A famous tale in deed. An animal is blasted with radiation and when they bite a human, said human gain theirs powers. Unfortunately for our main character, this time around she ends up as more of a harmless pet than a kickass superhero. Over the course of the week, our main character will develop traits befitting of a bunny girl. Though at least she'll always look cute at the end of it, I'm sure her family will make sure she gets lot of tasty carrots and bouncing exercise to boot.

Carrot Necklace
Our main character finds an adorable looking necklace with a jewel in the shape of a carrot hanging from it. She's warned of the curse nature of the necklace but wears it anyway. Soon she finds her life flipped up side down as the world treats her like nothing but a pet bunny, and her body and mind are sure to follow suit eventually.

Cousin's New Pet
Our main character keeps hearing about this adorable new pet her cousin got and insists on coming over. However she's shut down each time. Though one day she drops by unexpectedly, hoping to see this fabled pet of pure cuteness, only to find the cage is empty and then there's a sudden flash. Soon she finds her herself changing, in both mind and body, and she ends up spending a lot more time with her cousin. At least now she can see the pet she wanted to see so badly every time she looks in the mirror.

Other
How else could our young protagonist end up as a carrot chomping, bunny hopping, floppy eared girl? That's up to you to decide!
1133.title: Time to Hop into the story

info.brief_description: Watch as unexpecting victims get turned into nekos, kitsunes, and so much more
info.description:
Welcome to the story of how a poor victim ends up part animals due to some misfortunate events. It could happen anywhere or by any means. Perhaps a science experiment gone wrong. A magic bowl of milk some old woman gives them. Maybe a friend decided they wanted a new pet. Or maybe you find yourself in a whole new universe full of animal people. What happens is totally up to you

Rules:
1. No vore or heavy gore
2. No sex scenes
3. No unbirthing
4. No random transformation. You can have TG or even AR, but don't randomly make a neko girl put on 400lbs
5. Please make sure all options are well described, we don't want endless option chapters because someone didn't like how you phrased one of them
6. No less then a paragraph per chapter, its not much to ask people
7. No randomly killing off characters
8. Have fun and tell the best story that you can with others
